parameters.name: BgpGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the BGP group to which the BGP peer that you want to query belongs.

parameters.name: BgpPeerId
parameters.description: The ID of the BGP peer that you want to query.

parameters.name: IsDefault
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the BGP group is the default group. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the BGP group to which the BGP peer that you want to query belongs.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to obtain the region ID.

parameters.name: RouterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual border router (VBR) that is associated with the BGP peer that you want to query.
